main event: A circular object was observed hovering in Essex, Maryland on 16 August 1958.
interesting points: The object emitted no noise or exhaust,It was self-illuminated and cast a reflection on the water,The object was reported to have risen vertically out of view,The sighting was reported by a civilian and involved multiple witnesses,The duration of the observation was not reported.
witness description: The observation was made by a daughter and others in the vicinity.
